The Evillious Chronicles:
Credits

A list of the creators who have worked with mothy.

Artists

People who contributed art or created videos for mothy's work.

Musicians

People who helped compose or sing mothy's work.

Authors

mothy is the only person who has been credited with writing the lyrics, album text, and novels featured on this website. The manga are written by their artists, but mothy provides plot for all the non-comedy manga.
